verses.text: \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: but he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* not \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, like \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*:

For he walked \w in|strong="H3212"\w* the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* also molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w* for \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*.

Moreover he burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H1197"\w* his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, after the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 28.3 \ft burnt…: or, offered sacrifice\f*

He \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* also and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and on the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.

Wherefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*; and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and carried \w away|strong="H7617"\w* a great \w multitude|strong="H1419"\w* of them \w captives|strong="H7633"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add* to \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*. And he was also \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*.\f + \fr 28.5 \ft Damascus: Heb. Darmesek\f*

¶ For \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add which were\add* all \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*; because they had \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 28.6 \ft valiant…: Heb. sons of valour\f*

And \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Azrikam|strong="H5840"\w* the \w governor|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* \add that was\add* \w next|strong="H4932"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 28.7 \ft next…: Heb. the second to the king\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* carried away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* of their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and took also \w away|strong="H0962"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* from them, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

But a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was there, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Oded|strong="H5752"\w*: and he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Behold, because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* was \w wroth|strong="H2534"\w* with \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, he hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and ye have \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* them in a \w rage|strong="H2197"\w* \add that\add* reacheth \w up|strong="H5060"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

And now ye \w purpose|strong="H0559"\w* to keep \w under|strong="H3533"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* for \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w* and \w bondwomen|strong="H8198"\w* unto you: \add but are there\add* not with you, \w even|strong="H7535"\w* with you, \w sins|strong="H0819"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

Now \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* me therefore, and \w deliver|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captives|strong="H7633"\w* again, which ye have taken \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* of your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: for the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* upon you.

Then \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Johanan|strong="H3076"\w*, \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshillemoth|strong="H4919"\w*, and \w Jehizkiah|strong="H3169"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, and \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hadlai|strong="H2311"\w*, stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against them that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye shall not bring \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w captives|strong="H7633"\w* hither: for whereas we have \w offended|strong="H0819"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add already\add*, ye \w intend|strong="H0559"\w* to \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \add more\add* to our \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* and to our \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w*: for our \w trespass|strong="H0819"\w* is \w great|strong="H7227"\w*, and \add there is\add* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

So the armed \w men|strong="H2502"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* the \w captives|strong="H7633"\w* and the \w spoil|strong="H0961"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which were \w expressed|strong="H5344"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w took|strong="H2388"\w* the \w captives|strong="H7633"\w*, and with the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* all that were \w naked|strong="H4636"\w* among them, and \w arrayed|strong="H3847"\w* them, and \w shod|strong="H5274"\w* them, and gave them to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H5480"\w* them, and \w carried|strong="H5095"\w* all the \w feeble|strong="H3782"\w* of them upon \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of palm \w trees|strong="H8558"\w*, \w to|strong="H0681"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: then they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

¶ At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* did \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* him.

For again the \w Edomites|strong="H0130"\w* had \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and carried \w away|strong="H7617"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w*.\f + \fr 28.17 \ft captives: Heb. a captivity\f*

The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* also had \w invaded|strong="H6584"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the low \w country|strong="H8219"\w*, and of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and had \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, and \w Ajalon|strong="H0357"\w*, and \w Gederoth|strong="H1450"\w*, and \w Shocho|strong="H7755"\w* with the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, and \w Timnah|strong="H8553"\w* with the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, \w Gimzo|strong="H1579"\w* also and the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof: and they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* there.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w brought|strong="H3665"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w low|strong="H3665"\w* because of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; for he \w made|strong="H6544"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w naked|strong="H6544"\w*, and \w transgressed|strong="H4603"\w* \w sore|strong="H4604"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Tilgath-pilneser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto him, and \w distressed|strong="H6696"\w* him, but \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* him not.

For \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* took away a \w portion|strong="H2505"\w* \add out\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add out\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*: but he \w helped|strong="H5833"\w* him not.

¶ And in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of his \w distress|strong="H6887"\w* did he \w trespass|strong="H4603"\w* yet \w more|strong="H3254"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: this \add is that\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*.

For he \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, which \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* them, \add therefore\add* will I \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to them, that they may \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me. But they were the \w ruin|strong="H3782"\w* of him, and of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 28.23 \ft Damascus: Heb. Darmesek\f*

And \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and cut in \w pieces|strong="H7112"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* in every \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And in every several \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and provoked to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 28.25 \ft to burn: or, to offer\f*

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of his \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* and of all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add even\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: but they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him not into the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
